name: OPSWAT Filescan Sandbox
description: OPSWAT Filescan Sandbox is a unique adaptive threat analysis technology, enabling zero-day malware detection and comprehensive Indicator of Compromise (IOC) extraction

api_key.description: The OPSWAT Filescan Sandbox API Key to use for connection
api_key.name: API Key

poll_interval.description: Number of seconds to poll for a detonation result (Default: 5, Range: [1:30])
poll_interval.name: Timeout

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Retrieve detonation analysis results for URL
actions.verbose: Detonate url will send an URL to OPSWAT Filescan Sandbox for analysis.

password.description: Custom password, in case uploaded archive is protected

is_private.description: If file should not be available for download by other users

example_values: Found a base64 encoded http(s) URL prefix
Matched YARA rule PUP_InstallRex_AntiFWb with strength 0.75
Total benign: 1, Total unknown: 0, Total informational: 0, Total suspicious: 0, Total likely malicious: 0, Total malicious: 0, Total rejected: 0, Rejected reasons: [], Flow id: 1234

actions.description: Retrieve detonation analysis results for file
actions.verbose: Detonate url will send a file from Vault to OPSWAT Filescan Sandbox for analysis.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate
vault_id.name: vault_id

password.description: Custom password, in case uploaded archive is protected

is_private.description: If file should not be available for download by other users

example_values: Found a base64 encoded http(s) URL prefix
Matched YARA rule PUP_InstallRex_AntiFWb with strength 0.75
Total benign: 1, Total unknown: 0, Total informational: 0, Total suspicious: 0, Total likely malicious: 0, Total malicious: 0, Total rejected: 0, Rejected reasons: [], Flow id: 1234

actions.description: Search for scan reports on Filescan using parameters specified in the 'query' field

limit.description: Number of total results, maximum 50 (if page and page_size was also provided, then it will be ignored)

example_values: Total benign: 0, Total unknown: 0, Total informational: 0, Total suspicious: 2, Total likely malicious: 0, Total malicious: 0, Available report count: 5

actions.description: Get the reputation for one given hash (returns with the last 10 Filescan Sandbox reports)
Get the reputation for one given IP address (returns with the last 10 Filescan Sandbox reports)
Get the reputation for one given Domain address (returns with the last 10 Filescan Sandbox reports)
Get the reputation for one given URL address (returns with the last 10 Filescan Sandbox reports)
